algorithm_technique: Iterate backwards, build result, insert dashes at intervals.
problem_summary_simple: Reformat a license key by grouping characters and adding dashes, converting to uppercase.
problem_summary_technical: Format string by grouping characters into k-length segments, separated by dashes, processing in reverse.
key_insights: Processing the string in reverse simplifies dash placement.
The modulo operator `len(result) % (K + 1) == K` correctly identifies positions for dashes.
Converting to uppercase can be done character by character.
